page.title: 20Clubs in Longhope
page.content:
One of the best supported clubs in { {Longhope}is the{Evergreens}.It exists for those over 60 and meets in the village hall. Many activities are organised and the members have enjoyed visiting speakers,demonstrations and during the Summer months outings on a regular basis. We have visited the{ {Evergreens}to sing and do some country dancing. Many of the people have grown up in the area ,attending the village schools and they have told us many stories of the past. They meet on a Tuesday afternoon and in the morning the Playgroup meets so with both old and young catered for the life of the village area seems set to continue.
{This project was undertaken by Class 3 {of Longhope C of E School, Summer Term {1985.
